definition: clothing, food, housing and transport (idiom); people's basic needs
the people one depends upon for one's livelihood/one's bread and butter
not having to worry about clothes and food (idiom)/to be provided with the basic necessities
not having to worry about food and clothes (idiom)/provided with the basic necessities

sentences.english: Second, he pays little attentation to his cloth, food or other enjoyments but spend much money to buy law books.
sentences.chinese: 還有，他不注重衣食住行，而熱衷於購買法律書籍。

sentences.english: He tugged all the year round to feed and clothe his family.
sentences.chinese: 他終年爲全家提供衣食而勞碌。

sentences.english: Children depend on their parents for food and cloth.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們依賴父母供給衣食。

sentences.english: Money can help food, cloth and house in need.
sentences.chinese: 金錢有助於解決所缺乏的衣食住行問題。

sentences.english: Children depend on their parents for food and clothing.
sentences.chinese: 兒女們依賴他們的父母供給衣食。

sentences.english: Later the family live in wu need not founded.
sentences.chinese: 以後全家住在武南莊衣食無憂。

sentences.english: The gentleman had a valet to wait on him hand and foot.
sentences.chinese: 這位紳士有一個男僕照顧他的衣食住行。

sentences.english: Customer is the God of the core foundation of our business.
sentences.chinese: 顧客是我們的衣食父母，是我們事業的核心基礎。

sentences.english: How much money will you spend on the basic necessities (not including housing costs) each month?
sentences.chinese: 每一個月，你會花多少錢在衣食行上？
電視是足球的衣食父母。

sentences.english: As clothes, food, shelter and travel are the four elements for life; we can not live without one of them.
sentences.chinese: 衣食住行是人生的四件大事，一件都不能缺少。

sentences.english: Our parents provide us for food and clothing.
You need to be mindful of food, clothing, accommodation and transport.
sentences.chinese: 你們一定要注意衣食住行啊。

sentences.english: He received them, Lin Dong enough to live comfortably after six months of life.
sentences.chinese: 因爲得到她們的接濟，董林過了半年衣食無憂的生活。

sentences.english: If I win the lottery, I will be set up for life.
sentences.chinese: 假設我中彩票了，我下輩子就衣食無憂了。

sentences.english: Remember, that's the hand that feeds you.
sentences.chinese: 記住，那可是你的衣食父母。

definition: to have enough food and warm clothes/adequately provided
not having to worry about clothes and food (idiom)/to be provided with the basic necessities
having ample food and clothing (idiom); well fed and clothed
lit. food not filling the stomach (idiom)/fig. poverty-stricken
to look after (elderly parents)/to serve/to support
brocade garments, jade meals (idiom); a life of luxury/extravagance
